item.title: How I org
item.description: Org-mode is my exocortex, second brain, second mind, mind palace, pensive, personal knowledge management system, and apocrypha. It’s very flexible and the features I use as well as how I organize my files continues to change so I collected things here to document how I do things. I try to snapshot this periodically, so you might be interested in checking out one of those: [How I org in 2023](https://cmdln.org/2023/03/25/how-i-org-in-2023/) [How I org in 2024](https://cmdln.
